Trade/Device Name(s): IMMULITE 2000 Anti-CCP IgG Calibration Verification Material
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Siemens IMMULITE 2000 Anti-CCP IgG assay and calibration verification material for detection and calibration of anti-CCP antibodies associated with rheumatoid arthritis.
Indications for Use Summary: The IMMULITE 2000 Anti-CCP IgG assay is an in vitro diagnostic immunoassay for the semi-quantitative determination of IgG class autoantibodies specific to cyclic citrullinated peptide (CCP) in human serum or plasma on the IMMULITE 2000 system, aiding in the diagnosis of rheumatoid arthritis; the Calibration Verification Material is for control of calibration verification on this system.
